title: Cafe Gaia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Take-out, Canadian
description: Small, casual vegetarian cafe with hand-painted art decorate the tables and the colorful walls. Menu usually includes a daily soup, salads and sandwiches, a main hot plate, weekly specials, and desserts. No alcohol. NOTE: Their other location at 47A boulevard Montclair shut down in early 2012.
